# iotcentral Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
# Configuration
provider "iotcentral" {
    host = "https://<iot central subdomain>.azureiotcentral.com"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `host` (String) IoT Central Application URL. May also be provided via IOTCENTRAL_HOST environment variable.
